Posts.Content: Elena99 wrote: hi , i am 23 ,a year ago i started to have left breast pain and an inverted nipple;i went to see my doctor and had an ultrasound ,it came back normal and was given multivitamins tablets ,the pain stayed for a while and disappeared for 2 months but the nipple will retract at time.3 months later the pain came back ( it will come and go) ,had another ultrasound and again was normal .few weeks back my left breast started feeling more heavy ,the painÂ  was less often but my nipple was still retracted,confused i went back to my doctor and had another ultrasound yesterday which came back normal ....i don't know what to think as my breast feels weird and my nipple retracted. has anyone had similar symptoms???? please help Log in to post a reply
